level.text: 815.1 The Commission or the Department may conduct periodic compliance reviewsf CBEs to assure their continued compliance with the eligibility requirementsf the Act and these regulations.
815.2 In conducting a compliance review, the Commission or the Department mayerform site visits, review documents, and interview witnesses to determine theontinued eligibility of a CBE.
815.3 Where a CBE is found to be non-compliant, a notice shall be issued tohe CBE within 30 days which shall specify:
The corrective action that must be taken; and
The date by which the deficiencies must be corrected.
815.4 If the CBE fails to take corrective action within 30 days of the notice,he Department may institute revocation proceedings.
